title: DIU CSE Department Launches New AI Research Center
excerpt: The department has inaugurated a state-of-the-art AI research facility to foster innovation and collaboration between students, faculty, and industry partners.
content: Dhaka International University's Computer Science and Engineering department has officially launched its new Artificial Intelligence Research Center, marking a significant milestone in the university's commitment to cutting-edge technology education and research...
author: DIU News Team

title: Alumni Scholarship Program Launches
excerpt: New scholarship initiative to support current students through alumni contributions, providing financial assistance to deserving students.
content: The DIU CSE Alumni Association has announced a new scholarship program aimed at supporting current students who demonstrate academic excellence and financial need...
author: Alumni Association

title: Tech Talk Series Returns with Industry Leaders
excerpt: Monthly tech talks featuring alumni speakers from leading tech companies, sharing insights on emerging technologies and career growth.
content: The popular Tech Talk series is back with an exciting lineup of speakers from major technology companies. This month features alumni working at Google, Microsoft, and Amazon...
author: Event Committee

title: Global Alumni Network Expansion
excerpt: Expanding our reach with new chapters in North America and Europe, connecting DIU CSE graduates worldwide.
content: The DIU CSE Alumni Association is proud to announce the establishment of new regional chapters in North America and Europe, strengthening our global network...
author: Global Network Team

title: DIU CSE Students Win International Programming Contest
excerpt: Our current students have brought glory to the university by securing top positions in the International Collegiate Programming Contest.
content: Students from Dhaka International University's CSE department have achieved remarkable success in the recent International Collegiate Programming Contest...
author: Academic Team
